sources.title: Pecos Kid
sources.description: Taken from IMDB: A gang of robbers steals the deed to the Pecos Ranch and kill the family. The young son escapes, and years later he returns to the ranch to find the killers and reclaim his property.

sources.title: Pecos Kid
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Pecos Kid (1935) FRED KOHLER, JR
sources.description:
Stars: Fred Kohler Jr., Ruth Findlay, Roger Williams
Director: Harry L. Fraser

A land robber orders his cutthroats to steal the deed to the Pecos Rancho, land originally granted by the King of Spain. The owners are killed but their son escapes. Years later, he returns as the Pecos Kid to reclaim his family's heritage!

metadata.Plot: A land robber orders his cutthroats to steal the deed to the Pecos Rancho, land originally granted by the King of Spain. The owners are killed but their son escapes. Years later, he returns as the Pecos Kid to reclaim his family's heritage.
metadata.Actors: Fred Kohler Jr., Ruth Findlay, Roger Williams
